books.title: The Flash
books.author: Grant Morrison
books.description: The Flash is a comic book series written and illustrated by Grant Morrison, featuring the adventures of Barry Allen and his fellow superhero, who are both connected to the world of crime and justice.

books.title: The Walking Dead
books.author: Frank Darabont
books.description: The Walking Dead is a comic book series written and illustrated by Frank Darabont, based on the comic book of the same name by Robert Kirkman and Jesse Hill.

books.title: Batman
books.author: Bob Kane
books.description: Batman is a comic book superhero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The character was created by artist Bob Kane and writer Bill Finger, and first appeared in Detective Comics #27 in 1939.

books.title: Superman
books.author: Jerry Siegel
books.description: Superman is a comic book superhero appearing in publications by DC Comics, widely considered to be one of the most iconic characters in American comic books.

books.title: The-Hulk
books.author: Stan Lee
books.description: The Hulk is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. Created by writer Stan Lee and artist Jack Kirby, the character first appeared in The Incredible Hulk #1 (May 1962).

books.title: Spider-Man
books.author: Stan Lee
books.description: The Spider-Man is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. Created by writer Stan Lee and artist Jack Kirby, the character first appeared in Spider-Man #1 (May 1962).
